UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the Swasthya Margdarshan application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

email.description: The user's email address, used for login.

definition.description: Stores user profile information in a top-level 'users' collection. The document ID matches the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase Authentication UID of the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure uses a top-level 'users' collection where each document ID is the user's Firebase Auth UID. This simplifies queries for username lookup during sign-in, as it avoids collection group queries and the need for manual composite indexes. This structure is more efficient and scalable for direct user lookups.
